name: Underwater Uprising
description:
Aliens invaded the Earth and you are the last line of defense. Hunt down alien drones.

First version is very evil, your turrets have extremely low chance of targeting the enemy.

Don't pay attention to the cave base. You were supposed to drop the alien scrap there.

Cut features for time reasons:
- Animation hiding guns, closing ports when diving
- Underwater hiding mechanic
- Entire second game stage engaging alien mother-ship with a weapon built from alien scrap.
- Sound/Music.
